com.xceptance.xlt.ai.util

Class Helper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xceptance.xlt.ai.util.Helper

  • public class Helper
extends java.lang.Object
    Different helper for use in the program. All of them are static so there is no instance of this class.
    Author:
    Thomas Volkmann

    • Method Detail

      • inBetween

        public static boolean inBetween(int checkValue,
                                int referencePoint,
                                int difference)
        Detect if the checkValue is in the range from the referencePoint in respect of the given difference.
        Parameters:
        checkValue - Integer value which will be checked
        referencePoint - Integer value which is used as reference for the checkValue
        difference - Integer difference value
        Returns:
        true if checkValue was near enough, false otherwise

      • isInRange

        public static boolean isInRange(double value1,
                                double value2,
                                int percentageDifference)
        Check the range around value1 with percentage difference through getPercentageDifference(double, int) to value2.
        Parameters:
        value1 - double value to vary by
        value2 - double value to check against
        percentageDifference - int percentage difference for vary
        Returns:
        true if the values are in range to another, false otherwise

      • getPercentageDifference

        private static double getPercentageDifference(double value,
                                              int percentageDifference)
        Apply the percentage difference in the given range around the value. The value will always between 1% - 100% to avoid errors, even if it get changed from outside.
        Parameters:
        value - double value to calculate the difference
        percentageDifference - int percentage difference
        Returns:
        value

      • loadAllImagesScaled_FastBitmap

        public static java.util.ArrayList<FastBitmap> loadAllImagesScaled_FastBitmap(java.lang.String path,
                                                                             int heigth,
                                                                             int width)
        Load all Images from the given folder path. Use an image filter for only allowed images and only images. Images must end with one of the allowed endings ".jpg", ".png", ".bmp" , ".jpeg". Takes also a width and height for scaling imageToBufferedImageScaled(Image, int, int, int)
        Parameters:
        path - String full path name to the folder
        heigth - int value for scaling
        width - int value for scaling
        Returns:
        ArrayList all found FastBitmap in the folder

                                                                                                  int heigth,
                                                                                                  int width)

      • numberConverter

        public static java.lang.String numberConverter(double input)

      • checkFolderForMatch

        public static java.lang.String checkFolderForMatch(java.lang.String path,
                                                   java.lang.String currentActionName)
        If the option for a destination is used in the test script, this method try to get a match for the destination name. If a macth is found everything get sort into the destination. Otherwise there will be new folders with the given destination.
        Parameters:
        path - where the match should be
        currentActionName - per argument given string out of the test script
        Returns:
        result if there is a match the identification number get extracted for further use, null otherwise

      • convertTo2DWithoutUsingGetRGB

        public static double[][] convertTo2DWithoutUsingGetRGB(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
        Convert a BufferedImage to a 2D double array. This method didn't use the getRBG method it calculate the values native with bit shifting of the Integer values of the pixel. The alpha channel is also in consideration and get get special treatment.
        Parameters:
        image - BufferedImage
        Returns:
        result double[][] matrix of the image
